title: Few-Shot Learning in Computer Vision: Dual Domain Mutual Learning Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical process focused on real educational application for prospective/in-service teachers. Few-shot learning simulations in VR environments explore model training methods under data scarcity

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of few-shot learning and its application cases in computer vision
Understand the principles of dual-domain mutual learning techniques (combining GNN and GA-GNN) and implement them in a simulation environment.
Design metric learning strategies to reduce prediction bias in limited data environments and produce project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
